attributes.action: Public enquiry into vote leave campaign breaking the law to win referendum
attributes.additional_details: Vote leave have withdrawn the appeal against breaking the law this has to be investigated soon as possible.
attributes.background:
The vote leave campaign clearly broke the law the evidence is all available to show this.

Also all the evidence is available to show the affect that had in the referendum result this needs to be investigated if we do get this to debate in the house they will have to hold a public enquiry
